name: Dolphins Beach House
description:
Welcome to Dolphins Beach House! Closest Hostel to Sunshine Beach and Noosa National park! (Sunshine Beach entrance)

Our hostel offers 
Free surfboard and bodyboard hire
Free linen and blankets
Free Netflix & Stan  
Free parking
'POP UP' Free yoga (Inquire direct for dates)

*Our facilities include*
Air conditioning, hot showers, laundry facilities,  pool table, out and indoor seating, common rooms, book exchange, luggage storage.
6 self contained apartments which accommodate our 4 or 5 shared dorm rooms.
Private double/twin rooms with ensuite or shared bathroom.
We have 7 kitchens (you wont have to wait in line to cook your food) equipped with cutlery, crockery, ovens, stoves, cutlery, toaster, kettles, fridges, freezers, cupboards and drinkable water.

Sunshine beach and Noosa are very chilled out beach towns! Some ideas of What you might like to do while you visit! 

Borrow a FREE surfboard and surf on the lovely beaches along the coastal walk and have a look at the fairy pools on the way. Hang out in a hammock at the hostel Or walk the beautiful Noosa national park and try spotting koalas, whales and dolphins. Go to the farmers market on a Sunday morning or check out the well known Eumundi Markets on Wednesday or Saturday. Have a drink with a view at the newly renovated sunshine beach surf club. facilities at Watch the sunrise on sunshine beach or the sunset that looks over Noosa and its beautiful mountains and hinterland at the Laguna Lookout. Watch a movie at the cinema or borrow a few blankets, choose a movie and watch it on our TV. Rent a paddle board, a boat in the Noosa river or go on a day tour to the Everglades. Relax, unwind and enjoy 

Note: 
1: If you are Arriving after 7pm you will need to contact us the number on your confirmation email in the conditions section as its after office hours. Our office is open between 8amand 11am and 2pm until 7pm.
2:We are CLOSED Christmas day the 25th and there are no check ins or outs on that day, also no check outs on new years day the 1st.
3:No school leavers bookings permitted at the hostel
4:We have a 72hour cancellation policy, this does not include public holidays, Christmas or Easter. If you are willing to cancel anytime of those periods you will not be refund.

houseRules.notes:
Terms and conditions  
- Passports are required to stay at the hostel 
- Noise curfew is at 9pm 
- No schoolies bookings permitted at the hostel 
- No drinking games or goon permitted on the property. 
we have a beautiful beach 3 mins walk from dolphins which you can party on.


Note: If you are Arriving after 6pm you will need to contact us (contact details could be found on your confirmation letter) as its after office hours. If you are planning on checking in after hours your card will be charged the full amount. Our office is open between 8am - 11am and 2pm and 7pm.

We have a 72Â hour cancellation policy, this does not include public holidays, Christmas, new years and Easter. If you choose to cancel anytime of those periods you will be charged the full amount.

WE ARE CLOSED Christmas day the 25th which means there are NO CHECK INS OR CHECK OUTS ON THAT DAY.
We also have a minimum nights stay over Christmas and new years
